author: ngn
msg: Refactored FtpDataConnection to take care of data transfer (was previsoulsy done in Connection).
This also hides the use of blocking sockets in FtpDataConnection and enables us to use MINA for the data connection in the future.

author: ngn
msg: Adding known hack for deleting files on Windows.

msg: Enable the 'FOP Classic' modules, since it's just the 'ng' ones that have broken dependencies
